name: 最終試問 | Escape from the test
name_original: 最終試問 | Escape from the test
description:
”最終試問” is a horror game about a frightening experience visited upon the protagonist who has abandoned his studies.
To escape from the house where you were suddenly sent, you must collect four "丸暗記ブレッド!

Now, you who hate to study, why don't you get attacked by a "zero point test" too?

Duration

.15 min～

Operation Method

.・WASD keys for movement
・Use the mouse to move the viewpoint.
・Left click to get items.
・Press E key to display belongings.

Guidelines for video distribution

.All individuals and corporations are allowed to distribute videos without permission.
Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.

We are not responsible for any damages caused by the distribution of this game.

*There are plans to expand the area through free updates.
*There is a jump scare.
